skins.shipDescription: Agano-class light cruiser number two ¨C Noshiro.
skins.selfIntroduction: Just as Agano says, the great war in which we were born may have been an era of misfortune. ...No. As a member of the improved Agano-class, I should be able to make you satisfied with my work, if only there was just a place I could display my true strength.
skins.acquisition: I'm the new arrival, Noshiro, second ship of the Agano-class, reporting for duty. Let's do our utmost to prove our worth to each other, shall we?
skins.login: My, you're quite early today. For starters, how about checking today's schedule?
skins.details: Regardless of the situation, you should first calm down, think of a way forward, and only then act. That's how I tackle things.
skins.secretaryIdle1: ...Let's try thinking of some recipes for tomorrow's meals...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Keeping everything neat and tidy shortens the time it takes to search for documents. Why don't we start by organizing the documents on your desk?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Agano's exp... Yes, it's truly impossible to tell what's behind that fearless smile... She always ends up leading me around by the nose.
skins.secretaryTouch: If you're stuck, why not stop what you're doing, and instead, think of a different way to proceed?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: R-Regarding your conduct right now, I demand that you apologize and reflect upon your actions!

skins.shipDescription: Just as I thought, this is the perfect place for watching fireworks. You came here thinking that too, didn't yo8u?
skins.acquisition: Just as I thought, this is the perfect place for watching fireworks. You came here thinking that too, didn't you?
skins.login: It'll be a bit of a walk, but won't you come along with me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I only found this place by pure chance. Thinking back on it, I wonder how I was feeling when I stumbled upon this back alleyway instead of following the main road...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Please, watch your step. The road is very narrow.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If we're talking about dressing up properly for the festival, this is definitely the getup. However, I struggled a bit while changing into this. I even got laughed at by Agano. ...*sigh*
skins.secretaryTouch: Hm... Ah, I'll be fine even if you don't prop me up like that. ...Um, thank you very much.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Apologize and reflect upon your actions. Don't think that you're going to get away with it just because we're at a festival!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, what are you standing around for? Did you also need a change of pace? That makes two of us¡ª Come, there's nothing to be afraid of here.
skins.acquisition: Commander, what are you standing around for? Did you also need a change of pace? That makes two of us¡ª Come, there's nothing to be afraid of here.
skins.login: Phew... Go on, fly away, little ones. Mind the cage on your way out, now... I've been taking care of these guys. What have you been up to?
skins.details: Don't worry. There's nothing for you to worry about. All the preparations for the party and the related formalities have all been taken care of. All that's left for you to do is to enjoy the evening while savoring this beautiful scenery.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Wah! ...Sorry. I can't believe I almost fell... Um... T-Thank you for catching me...
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's a given that I love the atmosphere here, but another reason I like this place is that I feel like I can finally get away from Agano's endless teasing here... Though, I'd rather she just stop worrying about me in the first place...
skins.secretaryIdle3: This is yet another massive set built right in the Port. Yes, it's incredibly gorgeous... Honestly, when I saw it for the first time, I forgot I was in still in the Port for a moment. Speaking of which, didn't you also stand and stare in awe when you first came here?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe. I think even Agano would take a liking to this place, too.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Excuse me... How about I give you a massage... with this?
